message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect it to get any better from here on out!
You're not getting off that easy, Bob!
I'm not going to let you get the better of me, Alice. This is a fair split, and I'm willing to compromise.
You're running out of time, Bob! Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to let you bully me, Alice. This is my best offer, and I'm willing to make a last-ditch effort to get a fair deal.
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or walk away!
I'm not going to cave in, Alice. I'm willing to take the risk and wait for a better offer, even if it's just a small chance.
